td.content: shows significant small bowel congestion with necrosis, one adhesive band was found and lysed at the mid jejunum where it was fixed to the pelvic wall, a suspicious hard draining mesenteric lymph node was seen
shows a heterogeneously enhancing proximal jejunal mass with central calcifications

td.content: s:patient says she is having symptoms of critical bloated feeling 7-8 times a week, mostly during the day. she is a white female nanny aged 23 ys. ocas ETOH on w/e she denies smoking o:Height 154 cm, Weight 47 kg, Temperature 37.3 C, Pulse 71, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 68, Respiration 16, Skin = warm, dry a:Small Bowel Cancer p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to oncology.

td.content: s:patient describes critical denial of nausea, critical bloated feeling, critical watery diarrhea and Cancer. pt is a 23 yr old white f nanny. o:Height 153 cm, Weight 46.3 kg, Temperature 37.2 C, Pulse 71, SystolicBP 107, DiastolicBP 64, Respiration 16, Skin = warm, dry a:Small Bowel Cancer p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered exploratory laparotomy.

s:patient presents with moderate flushing for 2 days. pt also reports moderate diarrhea, moderate intermittent abdominal distension and pain. she is a female aged 25 Ys. o:Height 153 cm, Weight 46.1 kg, Temperature 36.7 C, Pulse 74, SystolicBP 105, DiastolicBP 64, Respiration 15, Skin = facial flushing, Skin = scattered facial telangiectasias a:Small Bowel Cancer p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed Oxaliplatin - 85 mg/m2 IV, Leucovorin - 200 mg IV, FLUOROURACIL - 500 mg bolus, and ordered CT Small Bowel, 5-HIAA, 24hr U, serotonin.

Value.Value: ordered CT Small Bowel , 5 - HIAA , 24 hr U , serotonin
